elements.title: portrayed a solar eclipse (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 1961 film Barabbas portrayed a solar eclipse (pictured) by shooting during a real one?

elements.title: Beibeilong (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Beibeilong was one of the largest oviraptorosaurs, with an estimated adult length of about 7.5 m (25 ft) and body mass of around 1.2 t (2,600 lb) or 2 t (4,400 lb)?

elements.title: a Salt Lake City TV station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that one of the longest civil trials in Utah history, with 1,000 exhibits, concerned the alleged coerced purchase of a Salt Lake City TV station?

elements.title: Ernst Scheurlen (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Vice Admiral Ernst Scheurlen was killed in action a month before the end of the Second World War in Europe while leading a hastily raised division of naval troops in defence of Germany?

elements.title: Luena Martinez (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that before winning The X Factor: The Band as part of RLY, Luena Martinez had released two singles as part of an anti-bullying campaign?

elements.title: Computer Applications, Inc. (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in a rapid decline, Computer Applications, Inc. went from the second-largest independent software firm in the United States to being bankrupt and subject to liquidation?

elements.title: North Carolina Council of State (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Elaine Marshall became the first woman elected to the North Carolina Council of State in its 246-year existence?

elements.title: Instrument 1 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Instrument 1 can be a guitar, piano, violin, or drum kit?
